EmailTemplate.name: TopGolf Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for the Texas Rangers Game
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for spending an evening with us at TopGolf! We really enjoyed the time together.
I am excited to invite you and your clients to an exclusive Livongo VIP event on Tuesday, May 22nd to watch theTexas Rangers play the New York Yankees. We look forward to hosting you and your clients in the Hall of Fame Warren Spahn Suite at Globe Life Park to discuss the HCSC Health and Wellbeing Clinical Management Solution, Livongo, and a favorite pastime, baseball.
Please share with your clients and RSVP at: https://livongorangers.splashthat.com/
Please feel free to reach out with any questions. We look forward to a night of camaraderie and fun.
Thank you,
Kara
KARA CARDINALE Vice President, Health Services Segment Livongo m: 773.551.4690 e: kcardinale@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave., Suite 3400, Chicago, IL 60611 www.livongo.com
